data.name: Cats Organized Neatly
data.detailed_description:
PLEASE WISHLIST OUR UPCOMING GAME üôè

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1597720/Feed_All_Monsters/


About the Game

Welcome to Cats Organized Neatly!



So, you have decided to become a crazy cat person.
Or you just like cats?
If that‚Äôs the case you are definitely at the right place! Because we have cats! 30 of them to be exact. They come in all shapes and sizes and‚Ä¶ we‚Äôve kinda lost track of all of them.

If you could take some time and just help us organize the little ones. Just pick them up and place them on the grid over there.
And don‚Äôt worry, they won‚Äôt bite even if you rotate them a bit.



KEY FEATURES

  • Cats
    30 unique hand drawn cats for you to befriend, collect and organize (neatly).
  • Handcrafted Levels
    The games come with 80 handcrafted levels which will hopefully tickle your brain.
  • Simple Controls
    The game can be played by just clicking the left and right mouse buttons, which makes it very accessible for newcomers or seasoned puzzlers of any age.
  • Relaxing Music
    Cats Organized Neatly has relaxing background music, resembling the atmosphere of a Cat Caf√©. Sit down and pet some cats.

data.short_description: In this 2D puzzle game you have the responsibility to arrange your feline friends in a way that fits the grid. Cats Organized Neatly comes with 80 different handcrafted levels and a whole bunch of cats in all shapes and sizes.
data.supported_languages: English, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Italian, Japanese, Dutch, Russian, Ukrainian, Finnish, German, Spanish - Spain, Turkish, French, Czech, Norwegian, Swedish, Spanish - Latin America, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Greek, Hungarian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (or Higher)
  • Processor: Dual-core from Intel or AMD at 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Videocard with at least 512MB
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
